description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. The new Ace Gals tennis championship is starting right now! There are 8 different players, each one with her own attitude and skills. Select your favorite one as your Avatar's trainer and win the others throughout 36 tournaments. Will you win the championship?
